LanguageData.JRWUdanoceratops.label: Udanoceratops
LanguageData.JRWUdanoceratops.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #048392-1992 [UDANOCERATOPS TSCHIZHOVI] CODENAME: SAYR >4921
A medium sized ceratopsian that is described as primitive despite their chronological age, found within the same habitat range as Protoceratops and Bagaceratops. The lower jaw is more rounded than usual, however, and is larger than their relatives. Inhabiting a wide range of biomes from jungles to forests to deserts, these dinosaurs have travelled the worlds for hundreds of years after their introduction. Seeing a travelling herd on a journey is said to bring good luck.
LanguageData.JRWUdanoceratops.tools.nose.label: nose
LanguageData.JRWUdanoceratops.tools.head.label: head
